it.polimi.traveldream.ejb.sessionBeans

Class GestioneComponenteBeanImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.traveldream.ejb.sessionBeans.GestioneComponenteBeanImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    it.polimi.traveldream.ejb.sessionBeans.GestioneComponenteBean

    public class GestioneComponenteBeanImpl
extends Object
implements it.polimi.traveldream.ejb.sessionBeans.GestioneComponenteBean
    La classe implementa il session bean per la gestione dei componenti: aerei, hotel ed escursioni.
    Author:
    Alessandro Brunitti - Andrea Corna
